content_description: Brand awareness campaign announcing Instamart launch in Tier-2 cities targeting food lovers aged 22-40.
Search ads targeting users searching for late night food delivery promoting midnight delivery guarantee with first order discount.
Personalised email to users who had not ordered in 60 days offering free delivery for one week and 30 percent off on favourite restaurant.
YouTube cooking recipe videos featuring popular dishes available for delivery targeting home cooks and food enthusiasts.
WhatsApp campaign asking users to refer friends with both getting 100 rupees off on next order targeting young professionals.
Instagram carousel ads promoting weekend combo meal deals for groups targeting couples and families ordering on Friday and Saturday evenings.
Facebook ads targeting existing users promoting subscription membership plan with free delivery and exclusive restaurant discounts.
Display ads introducing new premium restaurant partners on the platform targeting foodies in upscale neighbourhoods.
